options.fovEffectScale.tooltip: Controls how much the field of view can change in general.
customfov.options.submergedFovEffectScal: Controls how much the field of view can change when underwater.
customfov.options.flyingFovEffectScale.t: Controls how much the field of view can change when flying.
customfov.options.sprintingFovEffectScal: Controls how much the field of view can change when sprinting.
customfov.options.speedFovEffectScale.to: Controls how much the field of view can change from speed effects.
customfov.options.aimingFovEffectScale.t: Controls how much the field of view can change when aiming.
customfov.options.fovEffectsMode.none.to: The field of view cannot change from any behavior.
customfov.options.fovEffectsMode.vanilla: The field of view can only change from vanilla behavior.
customfov.options.fovEffectsMode.moddedO: The field of view can only change from modded behavior.
customfov.options.fovEffectsMode.all.too: The field of view can change from any behavior.
